name: hyperblast
description: Lazer Tag application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.start-backend-delayed: node -e "setTimeout(()=>{ const cmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'npm.cmd' : 'npm'; const cp = require('child_process'); cp.spawn(cmd, ['run','start','--prefix','backend'], { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true }); }, 2000)"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix frontend" "npm run start-backend-delayed"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
